welcome.large_window: Please make this window as large as possible.

eventMarker.found: Hold the USB event marker in front of the camera.
eventMarker.not_found: Note: no USB event marker found.

instructions.moving_dot: Try to fixate on and follow the dot on the screen as it moves. Try to relax.
instructions.blink: For this next section, start blinking when you hear a "beep", and stop when you hear another "beep".
instructions.close_eyes: For this next section, close your eyes when you hear a "beep", and open when you hear a "beep" again.
instructions.fixate: Please sit quietly for the next 1.5 minute. For the remaining minute and a half, fixate on the dot in the middle of the screen and relax. Try to relax.
